attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WORK FOR THE MONEY - This petition is to stop this government giving away tax payers money to the long term unemployed- (who have no intention of working), and the financial migrants- (even if they are asylum seekers). It's the system that's wrong and whilst it's there for the taking people can take. Please petition this government to change the benefits system so that they can see the views of the working tax payer, before we become the minority in a broken Britain that has spent it's money on those with it's hands out and not on those who are getting their's dirty. Our days are numbered unless we respond.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
